Sea Bright Kitchen Transformation

Completed in 2 months

Full Home Renovation
Google Review

"We recently completed a $140,000 full-home renovation in Sea Bright, NJ, transforming a closed-off layout into a bright, open-concept space. Our team relocated a centrally placed bathroom to open the main living area, installed two large windows for better natural light, and built a brand-new kitchen with quartz countertops, custom cabinets, shiplap accents, fresh paint, custom molding, and new flooring. We also relocated all lighting and built a beautiful island centerpiece--delivering expert craftsmanship, full-scope remodeling, and a flawless finish in just two months."
